structure.unit: ARTICLE II. POLICE RELIEF AND PENSION FUND

law.catch_line: Participants' rights and benefits not subject to legal process.

text.section:
Sec. 23-25. Participants' rights and benefits not subject to legal process.
The rights and benefits provided for herein are vested rights of the participants in the fund, and shall not be subject to garnishment, attachment, execution or any other legal process.
